meta.name: Baked With Love: Holiday
meta.description: In Baked with Love: Holiday, 10 talented pairs of home bakers face off in a warm-hearted, family-recipe bake-off.  They will infuse their heritage, personal stories, and cherished family recipes into classic bakes with a twist and serve their dishes to a panel of expert judges.  In the end, one pair will be crowned the Christmas Baking Champions and win the ultimate prize of $50,000!

videos.title: Sweetest Christmas Ever
videos.overview: The teams must pull out all the stops for a Christmas centerpiece showcasing three baked elements!

videos.title: The Night Before Christmas
videos.overview: It's the night before Christmas, and all through the barn, our bakers are stirring macaron batter.
